snippet.title: The Rise of the Golden Idol - Official Gameplay Trailer | PC Gaming Show 2024
snippet.description:
Check out new gameplay from The Rise of the Golden Idol, as you're tasked with solving yet more crime scenes by looking closely and putting all of the clues you find into the correct places.

The Rise of the Golden Idol is coming to PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and PC in 2024.
